data.quote: Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Work for that feeling that you have accomplished something. Don't waste your time on this earth without making a mark.
data.author: Joe Rogan

data.quote: Modesty is the color of virtue.
data.author: Diogenes

data.quote: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.
data.author: Naguib Mahfouz

data.quote: He has the most who is most content with the least.
data.author: Diogenes
